name: Big Sky Cabin Training Academy and Charter
about: Big Sky Cabin Training Academy and Charter, established in 2013, is a comprehensive aviation training institution based at Wonderboom Airport in Pretoria. We offer a range of courses including Cabin Crew Training, Pilot Training, Aviation Safety, Dangerous Goods Handling, Crew Resource Management, and Aviation Management. With a passionate and dedicated team, we have grown from a small operation to a robust training facility with 11 staff members. Our mission is to provide high-quality training, ensuring aviation safety and developing each student to their best potential. We are committed to continuous improvement and expanding our training capabilities to meet the evolving needs of the aviation industry. Our goal is to make aviation safer and more accessible through rigorous and personalized training programs.
